select
from mds_goodsdetailsinfo

select count(1) from mds_goodsdetailsinfo de join mds_goodsinfo gi on de.goodsinfoid = gi.id and de.isdel = '0' and gi.isdel = '0'
and de.ischeck=#{ischeck}
